titles.title: Protecting JOBs Act
Protecting Job Opportunities for Borrowers Act
Protecting JOBs Act
A bill to prohibit States from suspending, revoking, or denying State-issued professional licenses or issuing penalties due to student default.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committee.name: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

bill.summary:
Protecting Job Opportunities for Borrowers Act or the Protecting JOBs Act
This bill prohibits states from suspending, revoking, or denying driver's licenses, teaching licenses, or professional licenses based solely on individuals' default or delinquency on student loans.
